alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:16AM CDT until March 25 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 100.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 101.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
